/*getDrugInfo*/ SELECT drug_id as drugId, drug_name as drugName, manufacturer, registration_date as registrationDate, modification_date as modificationDate FROM drug
/*getDrugDetail*/ SELECT side_effect_id as sideEffectId, drug_id as drugId, description FROM side_effect WHERE drug_id = ${drugId} LIMIT 1

SELECT interaction_id as interactionId, drug1_id as drug1Id, drug2_id as drug2Id, interaction_content as interactionContent, registration_date as registrationDate FROM interaction WHERE drug1_id = ${drug1} and drug2_id = ${drug2} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO drug (drug_name, manufacturer, registration_date, modification_date) VALUES (#{drugName}, #{manufacturer}, now(), now());
INSERT INTO side_effect (drug_id, description) SELECT MAX(drug_id), #{description} FROM drug
mapper.update: UPDATE drug SET drug_name = #{drugName}, manufacturer = #{manufacturer}, modification_date = now() WHERE drug_id = ${drugId}
